title: Python for Beginners
desc: Start your coding journey with Python. Learn variables, loops, and build your first text-based game.

title: Web Development 101
desc: Build your own website using HTML and CSS. Learn how the internet works and deploy your first page.

title: Logic & Algorithms
desc: Train your brain! Learn how computers think with flowcharts, binary code, and pseudocode.

title: Linux & Cyber Security
desc: Step into the terminal. Learn basic Linux commands and how to secure a network.

title: Scratch Game Design
desc: Create interactive stories and games using block-based programming. Perfect for absolute beginners.

title: Ethical Hacking Basics
desc: Understand the mindset of a hacker to better defend systems. White-hat principles only.
